title: Mobile Game Engineer
content:
Interested in being part of a team that impacts millions of people? If youâ€™re energized by our vision to make the world a better place and you empathize with our players, then read on!Weâ€™re hiring exceptional people to help and grow our game titlesâ€” and to dream up new ideas that will reach millions. In this role, you will be working in a fast-paced world with some of the smartest minds in the industry.WHAT IS WAITING FOR YOU? Keeping our tens of millions of happy players in mind;Contributing to the development of current and new games using Unity3D engine Participating in project planning and estimationResearching, designing and implementing solutions which will enhance servicesSeeking and resolving any performance and scalability challengesWork as part of a team with other talented developers, designers and artists on the game teamThe chance to improve yourself inside Zynga engineering culture WHAT YOU NEED?BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science or any equivalent department3+ years of game development experience with at least 2 years in UnityExperience in the development of UI, audio, animation systems, shader effectsGood CPU and GPU optimization skillsDeep understanding of the mobile platforms and their specific requirementsStrong knowledge of object-oriented design, coding, and testing patternsEager to search/discuss/share information about new technologies & toolsComfortable with speaking/reading EnglishHaving analytical, practical problem-solving skills WHAT IS NICE TO HAVE? Experience in native development for Android or IOSReleased titles in Unity on a mobile platform is a big plusExperience in developing multiplayer gamesOne particular area of expertise (Architecture, Computer Graphics, Computer Vision, Network, WebGL, Client Security, â€¦)  WHO WE ARE?We are a game studio;In Zynga family located in IstanbulResponsible for biggest board and card games in Turkey and USABelieve in team spirit/collaborationHaving passionate, ambitious, and eager to learn/experience matesZynga is an equal opportunity employer. We are proud of our broad community; we do not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, medical condition, disability, or any other class or characteristic protected by applicable law. We welcome job-seekers, players, employees, and partners from all backgrounds. Join us!We will consider all qualified job-seekers with criminal histories in a manner consistent with applicable law.Zynga does not  engage in financial exchanges during the recruitment or onboarding process. We do not conduct job interviews over third-party messaging apps such as Telegram, WhatsApp or others. We will never ask you for your personal or financial information over unofficial chat channels. Our in-house recruitment team only contacts individuals via official company email addresses (i.e., via a zynga.com or naturalmotion.com email domain).
If you believe you have been the victim of a scam, you may wish to contact the authorities. In the United States, you may file a complaint with the FBI. More information is available here: https://www.ic3.gov.

demographic_questions.description:
As part of our Diversity and Inclusion Strategy we would like to collect demographic information from job candidates to identify and implement strategies to understand and improve equal opportunity for all at Zynga. Completion of this information is entirely voluntary and any details you provide will not be considered in the hiring process. Zynga will anonymize demographic information for reporting and analytics to gain a better understanding of our hiring process. This  information will only be used internally within Zynga and stored securely on our systems.  

For Zynga’s full privacy notice, click here for US Job Applicant privacy notice and here for the Outside of the US Job Applicant Privacy Notice . You can email Privacy@zynga.com for more information regarding the collections and use of your data.
